Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for submitting your online application for {!Lead.Company} into the Restoration Hardware Trade and Contract membership program.
Your application and supporting documentation will be reviewed and verified before confirming membership status in the Trade or Contract program. If the supporting documentation does not meet the requirements, your application will be cancelled and a new one will need to be submitted.
RH TRADE focuses on projects for Single Residences. If it is confirmed that your membership supports this project focus, your account will be serviced by our Trade team via your local store, or our dedicated Trade Service Team.
RH CONTRACT focuses on projects for Hospitality, Commercial, and Multi-Unit Residences. If it is confirmed that your membership supports these project focuses, your account will be serviced by our Regional Contract Team.
